channel.title: Final fight - top center Beam doesn't appear correct
channel.description:
[url]https://youtu.be/X12GEpz7D2s[/url]
check this 1:10. the beam does not come out of the center ceiling-hole.
Edit: Also, the hitboxes of the controllers seem to be a bit off.. or maybe they are just a bit small.
